# get data from a private page

<https://osf.io/deq3w> is a private page containing a copy of `iris`:

```{r}
library(osfr)
library(dplyr)
# 
iris2 <- osf_retrieve_file("deq3w") |> 
  osfr::osf_download(path = tempdir(), conflicts = "overwrite") |> 
  pull("local_path") |> 
  read.csv()

iris2 |> head()
```

get data from Serocalculator:

```{r}

library(dplyr)
temp <- osf_retrieve_file("n6cp3") |> 
  osfr::osf_download(path = tempdir(), conflicts = "overwrite") |> 
  pull("local_path") |> 
  readr::read_rds()

temp

```
